review: Love it and why didn't I get it sooner! Saving $100 a month, miss certain things about cable but I can live without. Easy to use, awesome, awesome and just an awesome gaget!
author: Kindle Customer

review: Will be buying another for my husband's TV in his mancave.
author: C. Wilson

review: Awesome I like it much better than the Apple TV .
author: Jason Sharp

review: Prime videos and  the Fire Stick are a winning combination.  Our TV is  a 2012 Samsung, it is a smart TV but it no longer supports Utube and Amazo Apps. The Fire Stick brought those applications back as well as many more. The TV Stick is very easy to use and install. We also downloaded to my IPad the Fire Stick remote App and a TV remote app. We control the TV from the IPad and no longer have multiple remotes to deal with.
author: Liliam "Miami Resident"

review: It was so easy to set up. It works great!
author: sami

review: Doesn't move as fast as I would like
author: denisegi

review: Great !  Should have gotten along time ago.
author: Steve

review: We love it!  I like the VideoCast APP, which lets us watch the daily ORTV Mass from Connecticut.  We also love the selection of old TV sitcoms, and movies.  I like the TuneIn App, which allows us to listen to some great radio stations.I'm still looking for a web browsing app!
author: Bob Hobbs
